title: **Prices dropped on remaining T212 Obaks F/S**

posts.post_title: **Prices dropped on remaining T212 Obaks F/S**
posts.post_content:
T212 Obaks, various players, 175 subjects, red backs, etc.  

All prices are delivered, paypal (payment owed), check or MO.  PM, Post or email - first.

*T212 - Kusel - SGC40 - Obak 175 Subj. - $65 **SOLD**
*T212 - Lalime (stamp on back) - SGC30 - Red Back - $30 **SOLD**
*T212 - Lewis - SGC30 - Obak 175 Subj. - $25 **SOLD**
*T212 - McDonnell - SGC30 - Red Back - $25 **SOLD**
*T212 - Mohler - SGC50 - Obak 175 Subj. - $65 (stamp on back) **SOLD**

Thank you, as always, for your interest.

Ed

Greg
